name: Lovely Island
description:
Lovely Island has a non-linear gameplay in the mixed genre of visual novel and point&click.Plot Romantic story about the adventures of the main character and four girls on a deserted island in the nearest future. Will you solve the riddle of the island? Will you get romance with one of the beautiful girls?In the game you can:
  • Steal the girls' panties and peep
  • Give your name to the main character
  • Pass the game with one hand
In our game you will find:
  • Mixture of novel, Point&click and Hidden Object
  • Atmosphere of a sunny deserted island
  • Three full routs connected to Alice, Sophie and twins Ai and Mai
  • Several endings
  • The final ending is influenced by your decisions made throughout the game
  • Nice drawing of sprites and backgrounds
  • Cinematographic methods of storytelling
  • Atmospheric original soundtracks
  • Different Easter eggs and references
  • Fan service
  • 4K resolution support
Setting Immerse yourself into the beginning of the story about a mysterious island. The world of the game Lovely Island is just like ours but it is in the nearest future and is utopic in many ways. The events of the game take place in the times when under the pressure of progress, the importance of human relationships and simple human values is becoming more acute. It is intensifying by the fact that the game is set on a deserted island. Island which can become the hiding place from the routine.
